content: लंका [लक्-अच् मुम् च] {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the capital and residence of Rāvaṇa and identified with the island of Ceylon or the chief town in it; according to some Laṅkā was much larger than the present island of Ceylon. It was orginally built for Mālyavat <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--2@} An unchaste woman, a prostitute, harlot. {@--3@} A branch. {@--4@} A kind of grain.
